title: Most of the apps started crashing on Pixel 5 as of 03/22/201/21 noon
content:
Most of the apps crash on Pixel 5. When I open GMAIL for example. It appears to close but it's running in the background. Same behaviour for most of the apps. Native apps like messages, phone are working fine.

I tried to clear cache, storage, restarted phone. Uninstalled and installed app. Checked permissions. 

Nothing worked. My phone has 85 GB free storage.

The apps keep crashing. I have requested a call back from Google but no response :-(

Please help!
